title: Mount Darnley
text: Mount Darnley () is a <a href="mountain">mountain</a>, high, in the south-central portion of <a href="Bristol%20Island">Bristol Island</a> in the <a href="South%20Sandwich%20Islands">South Sandwich Islands</a> off Antarctica. It was charted in 1930 by <a href="Discovery%20Investigations">Discovery Investigations</a> personnel on the "<a href="RRS%20Discovery%20II">Discovery II</a>", who named it for <a href="E.R.%20Darnley">E.R. Darnley</a>.
